All Classes

Class
Description
ActivatedLeaderMessage
This class implements a message that notifies everyone about a leader's play of someone.
Adder
Interface used for limiting access to player methods It contains methods for adding resources or faith points
AddFaithMessage
This cheat message is used by any admin player to receive a faith point.
BinarySelectionMessage
This class implements the BinarySelectionMessage.
BlueMarble
This class implements the blue marble.
BlueToken
This class implements the blue token.
Card
This interface unifies Development and Leader cards.
CardColor
This enumeration keeps all the available cards' colors.
CardGrid
A grid of DevelopmentCard decks
CardGridChangeMessage
This class implements the message that the server sends to every client on a card grid move.
CardType
this class represents one or more generic cards
Cell
This class implements a cell.
Client
This singleton class implements the client operation: connecting, reading, writing, disconnecting, ...
ClientApp
Main class for starting client, it can handle different arguments: --local if present, starts the match as local without communication with the server, eventually [--ip] or [--port] parameters wont be taken into account --ip/IP/address [address] sets the address to find the server --port [num] sets the port on which the server is listening --cli/CLI chose to start a CLI --gui/GUI chose to start a GUI If an argument is missing, takes it from the json file Preferences.json
ClientCLI
This class implements all the visual functions needed by the CLI version of the game to run.
ClientController
This class implements a Singleton controller for the client.
ClientGUI
This class implements visual functions needed by the GUI version of the game to run.
ColorCli
This enumeration is used to simplify the use of color in command line interfaces, using ANSI codes.
Communicator
This interface is used to let other classes access only to the player's list from a match and nothing else.
ConcreteWarehouse
This class implements the basic warehouse.
ConfigureMessage
This class implements a message from the client to initialize the configuration of the match Message structure: { nickname, configuration }
ControlBase
Interface used for communication with a specific player connected to the server
CtoSMessage
This class implements the the common client-to-server message.
CtoSMessageType
This enumeration unifies all client-to-server message types.
DevCardDrawMessage
This class implements a message from the player to order to draw the development card in the selected row and column from the cardGrid Message structure: { nickname, row's number, column's number }
DevCardDrawnMessage
This class implements the DevCardDrawnMessage from server to client.
DevCardPlacementMessage
This class implements a message from the player to order to place the development card(identified by its Id) in the selected column of the devCardSlots Message structure: { nickname, row's number, column's number }
DevCardSlotChangeMessage
This class implements a message that a server sends to every client, indicating the new card that a certain player has obtained.
DevCardSlots
This class represents the place where the player holds his DevelopmentCards purchased by the CardGrid
DevelopmentCard
Class that represents a Development Card of the game
DiscardedLeaderMessage
This class implements the message of a leader discard.
DisconnectionException
Class implementation of DisconnectionException.
DisconnectionMessage
This class implements the DisconnectionMessage.
DiscountEffect
Auxiliary class used for implementing Strategy pattern for the LeaderCard effect : Discount
DiscountMap
This class implements the discount map.
Effect
Interface used for implementing Strategy Pattern in LeaderCard
Effector
Effector interface is used to limit controller's access into the personal board.
EndGameResultsMessage
This class implements a message that notifies to every client the final leaderboard.
EndTurnMessage
This class implements the EndTurnMessage, to notify the players involved in nextTurn operation about their next states.
ExtraShelfWarehouse
This class implements the extra warehouse with an additional shelf.
FaithPath
This abstract class implements the common FaithPath things.
FaithPathCreationException
This exceptions handles: invalid faith path starting point, negative quantity of cell winPoints.
FaithPoint
Basic element of the game, it is an immutable element.
FullColumnException
This exception handles invalid dev card placements inside a full slot.
GoodbyeMessage
This class implements the GoodbyeMessage from server to client, for disconnection or end of match with no rematch.
GoodbyeSceneController
A scene controller used to communicate with the goodbye scene.
GreenToken
This class implements the green token.
GreyMarble
This class implements the grey marble.
GsonHandler
Class that expose static methods used for better build the GsonBuilder, to create the Gson object just call on the returned object .create()
HandLeadersStateMessage
This class implements the BinarySelectionMessage from server to client.
HighCardLevelException
This exception handles inserts of cards in a non-valid slot, due to a lower level card miss on position before of the same slot.
InitController
Controller used for regulating the login, reconnection and match forming phases
InitSceneController
A scene controller used for communicating with the scenes of the login phase.
InvalidCardRequestException
This exception handles: bad choices of card or slot indexes inside the card grid, dev card slots, etc.
InvalidOperationException
This exceptions handles all the bad input choices in standard in-game operation.
InvalidQuantityException
This exception handles all the client input errors in quantities: not existing card levels, warehouse insertions not present in the market buffer, etc.
JavaFXGUI
Class that handles the display of windows for the scenes and changes the current scene, it contains different static methods for handling the process
KeyboardReader
This class implements a reader for the keyboard, used for cli purposes.
LastRoundException
This exception is thrown whenever a player or Lorenzo satisfy end match requirements.
LastRoundMessage
This class implements the LastRoundMessage from server to client, to notify everyone that the last round has started.
LeaderActivationMessage
This class implements a message from the client to activate the selected leader Message structure: { nickname, leader's Id }
LeaderCard
Class that represent a Leader card of the game
LeaderDiscardingMessage
This class implements a message from the client to discard the selected leader Message structure: { nickname, leader's Id }
LeadersChoiceMessage
This class implements a message from the client to chose the starting leaders Message structure: { nickname, leaders' Id }
LeaderStack
A deck of LeaderCards
LightMatch
This class implements a pseudo-Summary for client applications.
LightPlayer
This class implements a summarized version of the Player class present in the server.
LocalClient
Singleton class for manage a local match, it contains all the game logic and the "network" stub
LoginMessage
This class implements the LoginMessage.
Marble
This abstract class is made common for every marble type.
Market
This class implements the Market.
MarketBufferChangeMessage
This class implements the MarketBufferChangeMessage from server to client.
MarketChangeMessage
This class implements the message that the server sends to every client in the match when someone makes a deal on the market.
MarketDrawMessage
This class implements a message from the client to call a draw action from the market Message structure: { nickname, true if the player selected a row (false if he selected a column), the number of the row/column selected}
Match
This class implements the Match functionalities.
MatchConfiguration
A configuration of the match all contained in one object
MatchController
This class works as a proxy controller, delegating the job to the various other controllers.
MatchEndedException
This exception is thrown when the last round finishes or Lorenzo satisfies certain single-match win requirements.
MatchRestartException
This exception is thrown by the rematch controller when every player accepted the rematch.
Message
Abstract class for a general message: contains only the nickname of the player, which means: - for StoCMessages: the nickname of the receiver player; - for CtoSMessages: the nickname of the client that contacts the controller.
MessageType
General interface to unify CtoS and StoC messages.
ModelObservable
This class implements the Observable-side of the paradigm.
ModelObserver
This interface implements the Observer-side of the paradigm.
MultiFaithPath
This class extends the common faith path things with multiplayer features.
MultiMatch
This class extends common things defined in Match class with multiplayer features.
MyJsonParser
Implementation of the Parser interface in order to use Json language, it is a eager singleton, you can recall it using MyJsonParser.getParser()
NegativeQuantityException
This exception handles: negative resources and faith positions quantities.
NewFaithPositionMessage
This class implements a message that notifies every player in the match the new faith position of a certain player.
NextStateMessage
This class implements the NextStateMessage from server to client.
NoMoreCardsException
This exception handles problems about using/trying to buy cards out of an empty stack.
NotEnoughResourcesException
This exception handles invalid payments from strongbox and/or warehouse.
NumPlayersMessage
This class implements the NumPlayersMessage, sent to server in the phase of choosing number of players for a match.
Parser
Interface used for parsing of messages and reading from files, in order to separate the language used from the network and model implementation
PaymentsMessage
This class implements a message from the client to pay the costs of a production Message structure: { nickname, list of costs }
PersonalBoard
This class implements the player's personal board.
PhysicalResource
Basic element of the game, it is an immutable element.
Player
This class implements the Player's identity.
PlayerConnectionStateMessage
This class implements the PlayerConnectionStateMessage from server to client.
PlayerHandler
This class manages the direct talk with the player, every exchanged message between client and server has to pass from here
PlayerSummary
This class implements the summary of a single player.
PlusOneShuffleToken
This class implements the plus one shuffle token.
PlusTwoToken
This class implements the plus two token.
Preferences
Class that contains static methods for to read preferences from a json file
Production
This class represents a production with its cost and earnings
ProductionEffect
Auxiliary class used for implementing Strategy pattern for the LeaderCard effect: Production
ProductionMessage
This class implements a message from the client for starting a production Message structure: { nickname, leaders' Id, a production the contains the translation of the unknown resources }
PurpleMarble
This class implements the purple marble.
PurpleToken
This class implements the purple token.
ReconnectionException
This exception is thrown when a disconnected tries to get back to the match he was into.
RedMarble
This class implements the red marble.
RematchMessage
This class implements the RematchMessage.
RematchOfferedMessage
This class implements the RematchOfferedMessage from server to client.
RematchPhaseController
This controller is used to handle the end match and rematch phase, accepting rematch offer and responses from the players.
RematchPhaseSceneController
A scene controller used to communicate with the EndGame scene
Requirable
This interface unifies CardTypes and resources (for cards activation).
Resource
This interface unifies physical resources and faith points (for cards earnings).
ResType
This enumeration represents the possible types of resources in the game
RetryException
This exception is a top-level exception: multiple other exception types cause a RetryException throw.
RetryMessage
This class implements a message that notifies the player about a Retry request.
SceneName
Enumeration for the names of the scenes, for every value there should be a fxml file with the same name
SceneProxy
Channel for communication between the ClientGUI and the sceneControllers, implementing Proxy and singleton patterns.
Server
This Class implements the main server, it will accept and manage every client that will try to connect
ServerApp
Main class for starting Server, if there is an argument the server will use that port, otherwise he will use the default one saved in the json file
ServerUtilities
Eager singleton class fundamental for synchronizing the threads that control the clients communication and the game logic
ShelfInsertException
This exception handles every problem about warehouse shelves inserts (adds, switches, etc.).
SingleCardGrid
A CardGrid for single player match, it is exactly equals to a normal cardGrid but you can discard cards from it
SingleFaithPath
This class extends common faith path things with single player features.
SingleMatch
This class extends common things defined in Match class with single player features.
SingleMatchException
This exception handles a rare and remote problem that consists in creating a multiMatch with just one player participating.
SlotEffect
Auxiliary class used for implementing Strategy pattern for the LeaderCard effect: Extra Slot
StartingPhaseController
This controller is used to handle the first game phase: leaders choice and starting resource/s choice.
StartingPhaseSceneController
A scene controller used for communicating with the scenes of the starting phase
StartingResourcesMessage
This class implements a message from the client to choose the initial bonus PhysicalResource Message structure: { nickname, the chosen resource }
StateName
This enumeration is used to keep together all the types of messages.
StoCMessage
This abstract class implements the common structure of every server-to-client message.
StoCMessageType
This enumeration unifies every type of server-to-client message available.
StrongBox
This class implements the Strongbox.
StrongboxChangeMessage
This class implements a message that updates the strongbox of a certain player on every client's VIEW.
Summary
This class implements a summary of the match situation.
SummaryMessage
This class implements the SummaryMessage from server to client.
SwitchShelfMessage
This class implements a message from the client to switch two shelves Message structure: { nickname, the number of the first shelf, the number of the second shelf }
TimeoutBufferedReader
Class used for reading from a BufferedReader managing and filtering ping messages
Token
This abstract class is common for every token and implements the common operation( such as onDraw, updates, ...)
TokenDrawMessage
This class implements a message that notifies every player about the extracted token.
TokenStack
This class handles correctly the token stack for single player's Lorenzo extractions.
TurnController
This controller handles all the messages and moves that characterize the turn phase.
TurnSceneController
A scene controller used for communicating with the gameScene
UpdatedDiscountMapMessage
This class implements the UpdatedDiscountMapMessage from server to client.
VaticanReportCell
This class extends the normal Cell, adding vatican report features to it.
VaticanReportMessage
This class implements a message that contains the new state of a certain tile and implies a VIEW change of every player on every client on the match.
Verificator
This interface allows the implementers to access to some verify methods on the Player's class.
View
This interface defines all the common methods that every view must implement in its own way
ViewObservable
This class implements the Observable-side of the paradigm.
ViewObserver
This interface implements the Observer-side of the client paradigm.
Warehouse
This interface is a piece of Decorator pattern implementation.
WarehouseChangeMessage
This class implements a message that updates the warehouse of a certain player on every client's VIEW.
WarehouseDecorator
This interface is a piece of Decorator pattern implementation.
WarehouseInsertionMessage
This class implements a message from the client to insert a list of ResTypes in the selected shelf Message structure: { nickname, list of PhysicalResource where the ResType is the actual resource, and the int value is the number of the shelf }
WhiteMarble
This class implements the white marble.
WhiteMarbleConversionMessage
This class implements the WhiteMarbleConversionMessage from server to client.
WhiteMarbleEffect
Auxiliary class used for implementing Strategy pattern for the LeaderCard effect: White Marble Conversion
WhiteMarblesConversionMessage
This class implements a message from the client to choose the conversion of the drawn white marbles Message structure: { nickname, the list of Physical resource to be obtained from the conversion }
WrongSettingException
This exception handles all customized configuration creations issues.
YellowMarble
This class implements the yellow marble.
YellowToken
This class implements the yellow token.
